author: jstrachan
msg: Allow the logging tags to specify whether their body should be XML encoded as text or not.
By default the body is now not encoded. So if you did
You'd actually get the following message in your log...
rather than the XML encoded version with < and > etc.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added a simple utility tag that allows a text file to be loaded into a variable as a String.

author: jstrachan
msg: Minor patch so that output flushing works better when using JellySwing by running the Jelly main() class.

author: jstrachan
msg: Applied Jason Horman's patch idea so that JVM options can be specified via the JELLY_OPTS environment variable.

author: jstrachan
msg: Applied Jim Birchfield's patches to support both a jelly.properties file when running Jelly from the command line as well as a new <properties> tag to load properties from a file or URI in Jelly script.
